law.catch_line: The Board shall waive the requirements for the practice of licensed clinical professional art therap...
law.text:
The Board shall waive the requirements for the practice of licensed clinical professional art therapy under § 17-304.1(d) through (g) of this subtitle if, on or before October 1, 2014, the applicant provides the Board with documentation showing:
Current certification by the Art Therapy Credentials Board, Inc.; and
Completion of 3 years of full-time experience providing art therapy.
